title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the justification

g ' ( x ) = e  f ( x ) f ' ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4466@

e  f ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B1D@ > 0 for all x So, g' changes from positive to negative only when f' changes from positive to negative. This occurs at x=-1 only. Thus, g has a local maximum at x=-1.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the justification

g'( x )= e  f( x ) f'( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4466@

e  f( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B1D@ > 0 for all x

So, g' changes from positive to negative only when f' changes from positive to negative. This occurs at x=-1 only. Thus, g has a local maximum at x=-1.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the justification

g'( x )= e  f( x ) f'( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4466@

e  f( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B1D@ > 0 for all x

So, g' changes from positive to negative only when f' changes from positive to negative. This occurs at x=-1 only. Thus, g has a local maximum at x=-1.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the justification

g'( x )= e  f( x ) f'( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4466@

e  f( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B1D@ > 0 for all x

So, g' changes from positive to negative only when f' changes from positive to negative. This occurs at x=-1 only. Thus, g has a local maximum at x=-1.
